name: How to turn on a TV (English)
name_original: How to turn on a TV (English)
description:
Versión en español disponible

(I hope I have not forgotten to translate any text)

Simulator of what it's like to turn on a TV, we fully trust our users' instinct to discover how to turn on a TV, any detail that seems to indicate something bigger should be totally ignored

Controls:

Directional arrows -> Movement

E -> Interact

Space Bar -> Pass text

Esc -> Enable mouse view

This game (if you can call it that way) is one I made out of boredom, I may add more endings (currently there are 8) and something else, any bugs or suggestions for a possible update you can leave them in the comments and I'll gladly respond :3
